name: Pirate Rum
description: A bottle of stolen pirate rum. Duidda, east of the Greybeard's Landing, is collecting Pirate Rum.

name: Energy Crystal
description: This crystal is humming with a faint energy. There was once an inscription, but the only legible part reads "Oo...""

name: Containment Crystal
description: Event Item. A mysteriously glowing shard of crystal.

name: Stone Relic
description: A long buried stone relic. Priory Explorer Leandra is searching for such relics.

name: Hylek Armor
description: This armor was most likely stolen from the local hylek. It should be returned to Yoal east of Titan's Staircase.

name: Merchant Remains
description:
